latex2image.title: Latex to Image
latex2image.description: Effortlessly convert Latex formulas to images!
latex2image.placeholder:
Enter your Latex formula here, HTML is supported: Example:

Title

This is an inline formula: $E=mc^2$

This is a block-level formula: $$\sum_{i=1}^n i$$

imageCompressor.title: Image Compression
imageCompressor.description: Online image compression, supports batch processing
imageCompressor.dropzoneText: Click or drag images here (multiple selection supported)
imageCompressor.qualityTooltip: Set the compression quality; higher values result in better image quality but larger file sizes
imageCompressor.maxSizeTooltip: Set the maximum size for compressed files; parameters will adjust automatically if exceeded
imageCompressor.maxImagesError: You can upload up to 10 images only
imageCompressor.maxImagesHint: You can upload a maximum of 10 images
